GK16viprud_u:5610: kampaṃ bhrāmyati sarvataḥ prativanaṃ pratyarthibhūbhṛdgaṇaḥ // ViPrud_8.246 //
GK16viprud_u:5613: kāraṇānāṃ samudyogaḥ sa dvitīyaḥ samuccayaḥ // ViPrud_8.247 //
GK16viprud_u:5619: śubhraṃ yaśaḥ śauryamahacca vṛttaṃ vidyānavadyā vimalaṃ kulaṃ ca /
GK16viprud_u:5621: atra yaśaḥ prabhṛtīnāṃ lokottararītisaṃpādane pratyekaṃ hetutve 'pi yugapatkhalekapotanyāyena saṃbandhaḥ /
GK16viprud_u:5626: yatraikasmin kāraṇe kāryasādhanāya pravṛtte kākatālīyatayānyat kāraṇamāgatya tatkāryaṃ sukaraṃ karoti sa samādhyalaṅkāraḥ /
GK16viprud_u:5629: vaktreṣu yadvāyuvaśāt patanti tṛṇāni devasya sa pakṣapātaḥ // ViPrud_8.250 //
GK16viprud_u:5630: atra pratāparudranarendrakrodhaśāntyarthaṃ raṇāgre prakrāntastutīnāṃ rājñāṃ vaktreṣu vāyuvaśāt kākatālīyatayā patitaistṛṇaiḥ kopaśāntilakṣaṇakāryasya sukaratvam /
GK16viprud_u:5636: yatrādbhutacaritopavarṇanād bhūtabhāvinorvastunoḥ pratyakṣāyamāṇatvaṃ bhavati sa bhāvikālaṅkāraḥ /
GK16viprud_u:5655: atrāṣṭādaśadvīpayuktāyā medinyā daṃṣṭrāgre mṛdbindurūpateti atyadbhutavarṇanayā tathāvidhabhāvanāyāṃ pratyakṣavat pratītisaṃbhavaḥ /
GK16viprud_u:5661: yatra prabalasya pratipakṣasya pratīkārāsāmarthyāt tadīyatiraskāro bhavati tat pratyanīkam / yathā---
GK16viprud_u:5668: yena yat sādhitaṃ vastu tenaiva kriyate 'nyathā /
GK16viprud_u:5669: anyena tadalaṃkāro vyāghātā iti kathyate // ViPrud_8.255 //
GK16viprud_u:5670: yadvastu yena kenacit kartrā yena sādhanena sādhitaṃ,
GK16viprud_u:5671: tadvastu tenaiva sādhanenānyena kartrā yadanyathā kriyate sa vyāghātaḥ / yathā---
GK16viprud_u:5679: yatra kramādekamādheyamanekasminnādhāre vartate sa ekaḥ paryāyaḥ /
GK16viprud_u:5706: atra kastūrīvilepanena timirasamayaḥ saṃketakāla iti prakāśitam
GK16viprud_u:5711: tadudāttaṃ bhaved yatra samṛddhaṃ vastu varṇyate // ViPrud_8.262 //
GK16viprud_u:5728: ato labhante kavayaḥ sahasraṃ gandhasindhurān // ViPrud_8.265 //
GK16viprud_u:5736: dattvā bhūṣāṃ kirātebhyo labhante valkalādikam // ViPrud_8.267 //
GK16viprud_u:5744: yadā pūrvapūrvaṃ krameṇottarottaraṃ prati hetutāṃ bhajate,
GK16viprud_u:5750: yatrottarottareṣāṃ syāt pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ prati kramāt /
GK16viprud_u:5752: yatra pūrvapūrvaṃ prati krameṇottarottaraṃ viśeṣaṇatvaṃ bhajate,
GK16viprud_u:5759: na tadrājyaṃ prajā yatra na bhavantyūrjitaśriyaḥ /
GK16viprud_u:5760: na tāḥ prajāḥ prabhuryāsāṃ na svayaṃ kākatīśvaraḥ // ViPrud_8.272 //
GK16viprud_u:5781: yathā laukikānāmalaṅkārāṇāṃ hiraṇmayānāṃ maṇimayānāṃ ca pṛthak saundaryahetūnāmanyonyasaṃbandhena cārutvātiśayo dṛśyate ;
GK16viprud_u:5782: tathaiva kāvyālaṅkārāṇāṃ rūpakādīnāṃ mithaḥ saṃbandhena saundaryātiśayaḥ pratīyate /
GK16viprud_u:5797: yatra tilataṇḍulanyāyena parasparasaṃbaddhā rūpakādayo bhavanti sā saṃsṛṣṭiḥ /
GK16viprud_u:5822: yatra kṣīranīranyāyenālaṅkārāṇāṃ mithaḥ saṃbandho bhavati sa saṅkaraḥ /
GK16viprud_u:5829: atra yātrāḥ prāvṛḍvihārā ivetyupamālaṅkāreṇa dvipaghaṭākādambinītyatropamā prasādhyata iti sajātīyayoraṅgāṅgibhāvaḥ ;
GK16viprud_u:5835: prakṣālanāyeva kṛtasya dhātrā tadvartino durlipikalmaṣasya // ViPrud_9.7 //
GK16viprud_u:5836: atra prakṣālanāyevetyutprekṣayā durlipikalmaṣasyetyatra rūpakaṃ prasādhyata iti vijātīyayoraṅgāṅgibhāvaḥ /
GK16viprud_u:5848: na cātra sādhakaṃ bādhakaṃ vā pramāṇamanyatarasyāstīti saṃdeha eva paryavasyati /
GK16viprud_u:5853: atra kīrttaya eva mañjarya iti rūpakālaṅkāre vataṃsayantīti sādhakaṃ pramāṇam/
GK16viprud_u:5858: atra pratipakṣabalārṇava ityupamāyā vyākulīkṛtasattva iti bādhakaṃ pramāṇam ;
GK16viprud_u:5862: evaṃ yathāsaṃbhavamanyeṣāmalaṅkārāṇāṃ saṃsṛṣṭisaṅkarau boddhavyau tatra tatra prabandheṣu //
